remarks: Theorem 19.29 of [Margaris] p. 90 with an implication in the hypothesis containing the generalization, deduction version.  (Contributed by AV, 19-Jan-2019.)
statement:
r19.29imd.1 $e |- ( ph -> E. x e. A ps ) $.
r19.29imd.2 $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. A ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
r19.29imd $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. A ( ps /\ ch ) ) $.
